snippet: A California judge ordered the release of a girl who had been placed in juvenile hall last month because prosecutors feared she would flee rather than testify against the man accused of raping her.
abstract: Judge Lawrence Brown of Sacramento County Superior Court orders the release of a 17-year-old girl who had been placed in juvenile hall because prosecutors feared she would flee rather than testify at the trial of the man accused of raping her.
lead_paragraph: A California judge ordered the release of a girl who had been placed in juvenile hall last month because prosecutors feared she would flee rather than testify against the man accused of raping her.

headline.main: California: Teenager Held to Ensure Testimony in Rape Case Is Released
headline.print_headline: California: Teenager Held To Ensure Testimony In Rape Case Is Released
